title: 'Cella: The Cedar Cove Chronicles, Book Three
description: Marcella Lewis, "Cella" is the only child of Madge and Sammy Lewis, granddaughter of Gil and Lana Ballard, niece and cousin to many. Growing up in a sea of relatives, Cella feels that no one listens to her and struggles to be noticed. At only fourteen, she suspects she's pregnant by her boyfriend, Jesse Jenkins. Ashamed to tell any of her family about her condition, she turns to the local witch for help; changing her life forever.
author: Cynthia Ulmer
